评论详情: Very cute sweater, love the color. It's not to heavy, true to size and washes great. I found it comfortable and flattering.

评论概述: Nice shirt, but not a sweatshirt
评论详情: I am happy with the look and fit of this shirt.  I ordered a medium. It's roomy and comfortable,  the bright pink color is pretty,  but it's misleading to call it a 'sweatshirt '. The material is thicker than a t-shirt, but it's definitely not sweatshirt material. I like the v- neck style of it. I definitely kept it and am happy with the color and fit but you should know it's not an actual sweatshirt.  It washed perfectly,  no shrinking or pilling of the material.  I would give it 5*, if they didn't call it a sweatshirt and make you think that's what you're getting.  Now that I know the type of material it is, I would definitely order more in different colors. If you want a nice, long sleeve v neck,  this is great. If you want an actual thick,  sweatshirt type shirt you'll be happy with the fit and feel of the material but know it's not a sweatshirt.

This is a very comfortable flattering top. Nice lines to it. The waistband is nice and wide so it does not curl up and the length sits nicely around the hips. Casual top but a bit elevated in it's style. I will probably buy more in different colors. :-)
Nice color , not to thick nice material perfect fit

This sweatshirt is soft and comfortable. It’s a good fit, not too tight loose, and the color is accurate. However, I wanted a sweatshirt with pockets. The description says it has kangaroo pockets. That would have been acceptable, but it has none!  I’m still going to keep it because it’s good quality for the price.
The shirt is huge! It says loose fitting but this is about 2sizes to big. I will be returning.
I am very pleased with this top.  It is between a tee and a sweatshirt.  Very comfortable and more stylish than most sweatshirts.  Thinking of buying more colors.  It does run a bit large.
The fit is perfect and the material is so soft and comfortable. Would recommend to buy.

I was expecting a heavier sweatshirt material.  Since I am only 5'1", it went below my rear end about 6 inches.  I can sew, therefore I will cut off the bottom band and get it to look better  length wise.  I loved the style.  The material washed without shrinking.  Thank you!

This shirt was very well made, heavier material and looked great on!  The white color that I ordered and needed was more of a cream color so I had to send it back.  May have to try this in a different color!
This top was pretty nice.  Soft, no pockets, little longer than I thought, but might shrink just enough once I wash it.  I purchased XL and it was good.
It’s a very cute top on and fits great! I love the v neck. The only disappointment was that I thought it would be warmer. But it will be wonderful in the Spring
I loved the color I had ordered on line BUT it was not the color I received..but it is comfortable and good quality
Nice quality and true to size. I only returned due to color. The navy color was more purplish and I needed a dark navy. I will definitely reorder another color.
Nice casual top.  Not very transparent and I like that!
I ordered this for a winter sweatshirt.  The fabric is not sweatshirt material, it's thin.  Size was good, but quality was poor.
Washed up nice and looks great on. Wasn’t sure how the neck would lay, but it lays flat like it should. Love the color, I got the “orange” but it’s more of a rust which is what I was wanting.

This isn't what I was expecting.  I thought it would be made out of regular sweatshirt material.  It is not.  The fabric is cotton/polyester/spandex.  The color isn't what I was expecting either.  It was advised as orange.  However, it is a red/orange color.  Although it was different from that what was advertised, I love it and may order another one in a different color.
It is super soft and goes with anything such as jeans or leggings or even a skirt.

评论概述: Love the feel of this against my skin and the fit is just perfect

she likes them and looks sexy!
Most comfortable, so soft. I am going to buy more but different colors.
This is a long sleeved T-shirt, not a sweatshirt. It is good for a banded tee, but if you want a typical sweatshirt, look elsewhere
It runs alittle big for a small
The shirt was the right size and fit just like I like it.
Great fit, very soft and love the color.
Fits me well and I love it. Soft and stretchy

I ordered this in black. I really liked the way it fit, casual but not boxy or too thick, BUT THE SMELL. Ugh. Maybe it was just the black dye? It reminded me of the dye smell on cheap black jeans (you listening, Old Navy?) anywho, I am going to order a different color and see if the same issue exists. The black will take many washes to get the smell out - if I decide to keep it!

I loved this soft pull over! The sleeves are a nice length and it comes down around my hips which I like because it covers all the not so flattering spots!  Needless to say I look pretty good in it so I ordered another! It’s very comfortable! Love it!
It was just as pictured.

I love the fit and the length of this sweatshirt.  Plus it's a little more dressy than a "regular" sweatshirt because of the material and the neckline, so I can wear it for less casual occasions.  Even though it isn't regular sweatshirt material, it is still warm!
Fits well, soft and very comfortable. Would order again
My Mother loves the shirt.
This top is pretty much as described- lightweight, oversized, stretchy, soft. The v neck is a nice feature. Will be nice for Fall.
Top fit fine in a size large which I usually wear. It’s very casual, but I like it.
Excellent product, great material, Beautiful style, value for money.  5⭐️

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: I needed winter shirts so when I seen this I decided to try it. I don’t like big over sized shirts, or clothing with writing on them ( I don’t like being a walking billboard. I’ve gotten compliments on this shirt, buy it you won’t regret it
Pretty color. Very light weight. Definitely not a sweat shirt. So disappointed

I liked the material but it is way to long for me.  So I will only wear it in the house.
Material too thin to be called a sweatshirt
This is a T-shirt weight top and the cuffs on arms and waist are way too heavy for such lightweight body material. I did like the neckline but needed something warmer.
This is very light and comfortable. Great material on the skin.
It is extremely large for the rating. I know  it says over size but it runs much larger than the size rating.
This isn't a sweatshirt but it's heavier than a T-shirt fabric.  It's very soft and I love the neckline. The length is long
The item was well made but not the winter weight I was looking for.  Fabric was soft to touch, but never even tried it on.
Liked the cut of the top but the color or fabric was too light - I could see my jeans through the top. Not a good look… maybe a darker color would have the same problem. Returned .

评论概述: Nice quality top, not really a sweatshirt
评论详情: Love the design, fabric is not scratchy on the neckline, true to size, sleeves are longer (I have long arms and it doesn’t sit at 3/4 sleeve length), good length, not a crop top, sits comfortably on waist and covers waistband and button of jeans (I am 5’ 10” and long torso). Hope this review is helpful.

The description of this top refers to it as a sweatshirt and it is definitely not. Also, it does not run true to size. I find it runs big so I wish I would have bought a size smaller. Hopefully, it will shrink a little when I wash it. Other than that, it is a cute style.

Perfect middle ground between a long sleeve T and a sweatshirt.  Not too heavy or light.  Washed beautifully, fits perfectly and more stylish than a T or sweatshirt.  This is my second purchase.  Vibrant colors great flattering fit and feel.
Likes the vee neck
the sleeves are a little long for shorter arms.
Lightweight, great fit and color. Bought in another color as well.
Love this sweatshirt.  Material is very soft and the neckline is very flattering.

评论概述: The comfort of the shirts are great
评论详情: I love everything about these shirts very comfort fit and love the style
Stylish and comfy
I like it! Soft and love the neckline.
Love the fit and quality. Fits true to size. I will be purchasing in other colors. It's a little thicker than I expected, but it's great.

This is a lightweight, soft nice quality sweatshirt that is true to size and color as shown. It is a perfect fit for me and I am 5’9” and 160 lbs. I ordered a medium and It’s a perfect fit! If you want oversized you should order up a size.
Product is comfortable. It’s long too which I like.

I bought 3 colors to use as a base layer under vests.  Colors are good.  The material is light enough to wear a vest over in 60-65 degree temps.  Not too light, but not too heavy either.  Just a nice weight that still has some body to it.
Good fit, lighter than most sweatshirts, attractive sightly nicer design than regular crewnecks.

This sweatshirt is a good medium weight. It's very comfortable and has a slightly longer length. I like the cuffs on the sleeves. It runs large. I like that the neck is open and not a crew neck. It looks more stylish.
This is advertised as a sweatshirt, it isn't. The material is very thin. Style is ok but very disappointed that it wasn't actually a sweatshirt. I returned it.

Lint gathers quickly on this garment and I’ve only washed it once, gentle cycle.
One of the most comfortable shirts I’ve had! Nice quality as well.
I am not happy with the quality or sizing as pet description on site.  Will not order from this vendor again.
The package was shrink-wrapped and the sweater has many wrinkles that I can get out!! The tag says warm iron may be used. Hope that works!
Very disappointed with this product. Washed twice. Colored has faded  and the material piled. I bought this shirt in December,  it's  January and the shirt looks 5 years old.
I’m not a fan of this sweater. It’s very thin, yet somehow not a breathable fabric. I was looking for a thin sweatshirt like material and I find this a little on the scratchy side.
I would’ve returned it, but I missed it by two days. Christmas was too busy and by the time it settle down to return it my time period had passed.
LOOKS LIKE A SALVATION REJECT.  NOT THE COLOR IN THE PICTURE AND HANGS ON THE BODY LIKE A RAG.
Didn’t like the clingy fabric. Sent it back!
The material was not at all like a regular conventional sweatshirt. The color was misleading from what I saw online. I sent it back.
this is not a heavy sweatshirt material....very light!
Not style I expected.
Wasn't the color shown
Not sweatshirt material. Very thin fabric, not fluffy like a normal sweatshirt.

Is it casual? Yes. Is it loose fit? Yes. Is it lightweight? Yes. Is it a sweatshirt? Hmm… But nowadays, I noticed many shirts which say it’s a “sweatshirt” is nothing like a sweatshirt that I’m used to wear. So I don’t want to call this as a sweatshirt, but yes, it’s a pullover top.  The fabric is a bit thicker than t-shirt but not heavy at all, like my college sweatshirt. It’s soft and very comfortable for sure. I got in dark gray and the color looks good.

评论概述: Very soft and beautiful coral shirt
评论详情: I love the softness and coral color of this shirt. The V-neck is a cute touch, and the thicker material makes it perfect for fall or layering in winter. However, it does run large, so I recommend sizing down if you're between sizes or prefer a slimmer fit.

I ordered a XXL out of frustration with XL sizing being all over the map. This is a true XXL which means it's too large for me, but that's not the manufacturer's problem. The material is soft and comfy. The little notch in the neck is nice and gives it a touch of style that it would otherwise lack. A nice easy casual basic top. Note this is not 'sweatshirt' material in the US sense, which is typically a cotton or cotton poly blend which is smoother/more finished on the exterior with a cozy soft interior. This is a sweatshirt style top made of a different kind of fabric. If you are looking for an actual sweatshirt, this will not be your jam.

I love the coral color of this sweatshirt.  The V neck is done great with facing to make sure it lays down properly.  It really is sewn flawlessly.  My only complaint is that it is supposed to be loose fitting and ordered my regular size but it is a bit tight. Stretchy, but still not loose fitting.  So, I would order a size (or2) bigger if you really want a loose fit.
This is a nice sweatshirt.  The detailing makes it a little fancier than a regular sweatshirt.  It's also a little more structured. It runs true to size and fits well.
Comfortable

I love the color of this sweatshirt. It's a very lightweight sweatshirt style. I feel like the cut of the neckline is flattering and it has a nice length to it. The sleeves are super long on me though. It's a nice transition piece for the fall where it gets cool, but not cold. It doesn't have a fleece interior like some sweatshirts do, which makes it not as heavy and warm.
Nice color. Sleeve length perfect. Good for fall/winter. Soft.
Good quality, fits as expected and comfortable. Easy to dress up or down.

评论概述: Casual feel with a more pulled together look.
评论详情: This is an interesting top. It's thin like a light weight tee shirt, but then it has a v-neck to give it a more formal look. The band around the waist helps pull it together to give it a more finished look and not too casual. It has a casual feel but with a pulled together look to it.  I ordered this in a size medium and it's a good fit. I'm 5'5" and weigh about 143lbs and the top isn't tight at all, but also not too loose on me. So the sizing seems to be spot on.

This top just became my new favorite, and I'm really looking forward to wearing it when cool weather hits. I ordered the dark grey in size small. I would say sizing is true to the chart. The construction is very nice, and the fabric is so soft.  The dark grey is a lovely color. The design of the top feels and looks good on me. So glad I ordered this.

I am so happy that this teal matches the listing photos. It is a beautiful teal with blue undertones.  This is not sweatshirt material in the classic sense. It has no fuzzy interior. It is basically a thick cotton and rides the line between a shirt and a sweatshirt.  The fit does have quite a nice drape. And the bottom hem is thick and somewhat elastic. It could be worn straight down or tucked under to bubble the bottom of the shirt.  I would not say that this is all that warm but it is a nice weight for California weather in the winter.

Basic black sweatshirt.  Good quality material, well made.  Very comfortable, long sleeves are not tight.  Fits true to size.  Stitching is well done, length covers my bum.  Very happy with this.  I have not washed yet, but I am certain it will wash well.  Good for cooler/cold weather.

I really like this "sweatshirt" although the fabric is not heavy or thick like a sweatshirt would typically be made from. To me, due to the fabric being thinner, it seems more like a tunic, which I am fine with.  I like the color which is a little darker than the photos and it fits me just right and accordingly with the sizing chart.

This shirt is very nice! It’s well made and the fabric is soft. It’s also more of a loose fit, it doesn’t hug every curve which is nice because I prefer my tops to be a bit more on the loose side. I went with my normal top size (large). This is versatile, I feel like you could wear it to the office or just lounging around at home. I can’t wait until it gets cold so I can wear it. I’d definitely recommend this.
This sweatshirt is lightweight which is great for fall weather.  Love the color, the size chart is accurate.  I ordered the XL and it fits great over a tank top or t-shirt.

Reviewed by the wife: I got the Pink, which is just as vibrant as the picture. I also got Large, which is my usual size. Fits perfectly!!!! Roomy enough, as a sweatshirt should be, but shaped to flatter.! Not boxy, like many sweatshirts. The V-neckline is a little different, which is also very feminine. The material is light enough for cool fall days, or indoors. The price is more than reasonable. Love it!!!

评论概述: Lovely color, so soft, nice casual
评论详情: My wife loves this long sleeved v neck sweatshirt. The color is spot on, the v neck and ever so slightly puffed sleeves give it more style than a typical sweatshirt, it is so very soft, and seems well made. My wife is 5’2”, 118 lbs, and ordered a small. The sleeves are a bit long, which she doesn’t mind, and other than that it fits great with a little fashionable drapiness.
